csc171.project02.model

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc171.project02.model.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    A Customer Object that defines and implements the necessary state and behavior to define and uniquely identify a Customer to the Bank

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String password)
        This method checks whether the passed password matches this Customer's saved password. If so, the Customer is allowed to authenticate.
        Parameters:
        password - is the password to check against the Customer's private password
        Returns:
        true if the password is correct
